db:abstract.db:para: The QFontVariableAxis class represents a variable axis in a font.
This class was introduced in Qt 6.9.

db:note.db:para: All functions in this class are reentrant.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Variable fonts provide a way to store multiple variations (with different weights, widths or styles) in the same font file. The variations are given as floating point values for a pre-defined set of parameters, called "variable axes".

Specific parameterizations (sets of values for the axes in a font) can be selected using the properties in QFont, same as with traditional subfamilies that are defined as stand-alone font files. But with variable fonts, arbitrary values can be provided for each axis to gain a fine-grained customization of the font's appearance.

QFontVariableAxis contains information of one axis. Use QFontInfo::variableAxes() to retrieve a list of the variable axes defined for a given font. Specific values can be provided for an axis by using QFont::setVariableAxis() and passing in the tag().

db:note.db:para: On Windows, variable axes are not supported if the optional GDI font backend is in use.

db:section.db:title: QFontVariableAxis::QFontVariableAxis(const QFontVariableAxis &axis)
db:section.db:para: Creates a QFontVariableAxis object that is a copy of the given axis.

db:section.db:title: qreal QFontVariableAxis::defaultValue() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the default value of the axis. This is the value the axis will have if none has been provided in the QFont query.

db:section.db:title: qreal QFontVariableAxis::maximumValue() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum value of the axis. Setting the axis to a value which is higher than this is not supported.

db:section.db:title: qreal QFontVariableAxis::minimumValue() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the minimum value of the axis. Setting the axis to a value which is lower than this is not supported.

db:section.db:title: QString QFontVariableAxis::name() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the name of the axis, if provided by the font.

db:section.db:title: void QFontVariableAxis::setDefaultValue(qreal defaultValue)
db:section.db:para: Sets the default value of this QFontVariableAxis to defaultValue.

db:note.db:para: Typically, there will be no need to call this function as it will not affect the font itself, only this particular representation.

db:section.db:title: void QFontVariableAxis::setMaximumValue(qreal maximumValue)
db:section.db:para: Sets the maximum value of this QFontVariableAxis to maximumValue.

db:note.db:para: Typically, there will be no need to call this function as it will not affect the font itself, only this particular representation.

db:section.db:title: void QFontVariableAxis::setMinimumValue(qreal minimumValue)
db:section.db:para: Sets the minimum value of this QFontVariableAxis to minimumValue.

db:note.db:para: Typically, there will be no need to call this function as it will not affect the font itself, only this particular representation.

db:section.db:title: void QFontVariableAxis::setName(const QString &name)
db:section.db:para: Sets the name of this QFontVariableAxis to name.

db:note.db:para: Typically, there will be no need to call this function as it will not affect the font itself, only this particular representation.

db:section.db:title: void QFontVariableAxis::setTag(QFont::Tag tag)
db:section.db:para: Sets the tag of QFontVariableAxis to tag.

db:note.db:para: Typically, there will be no need to call this function as it will not affect the font itself, only this particular representation.

db:section.db:title: QFont::Tag QFontVariableAxis::tag() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the tag of the axis. This is a four-character sequence which identifies the axis. Certain tags have standardized meanings, such as "wght" (weight) and "wdth" (width), but any sequence of four latin-1 characters is a valid tag. By convention, non-standard/custom axes are denoted by tags in all uppercase.

db:section.db:title: QFontVariableAxis &QFontVariableAxis::operator=(const QFontVariableAxis &axis)
db:section.db:para: Assigns the given axis to this QFontVariableAxis.
